Name: Grand Warstorm: Part II
QuestDesc: As the promised raindrops fall upstream, you embark on a journey north to the battlefield in search of answers.

Chapters.Title: Go deeper into the Norfall Valley

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rocks! One o'clock!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Watch out! Tacet Discords incoming!

Chapters.Title: Go deeper into the Norfall Valley

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's more of them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Move! We're running out of time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We’ll shake them off. Use your Grapple now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master Jianxin!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jianxin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's too many of them. Someone must stay behind to keep them at bay.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jianxin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone, let's part our ways here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jianxin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Carry on with your mission. You can leave the rest to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yangyang, Rover... Follow me! We're going down from here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mind the cliff!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, are you alright?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stay sharp. More Tacet Discords incoming.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Suspended Ruins are ahead of us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Resonance Beacon here is still functioning, and the defense feature is intact too. We can catch our breath here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Ovathrax assault has been as brutal as expected. We've been cut off from our main forces.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the three of us against them all from here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master Jianxin... I hope she is okay...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I tried to contact her and our base, but nothing came back. The Threnodian's power is possibly interfering with Terminal signals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have no choice but to trust them now. Let's press on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're bound to face a vicious fight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've reached the Suspended Ruins. We'll get going once you're ready.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After a fierce charge, you arrive at the Suspended Ruins. The Threnodian is now within reach.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's unusually quiet inside. Tread with caution.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This wall... We should be able to Pull it away with our Grapple.

Chapters.Title: Explore the depths of the Hovering Ruins

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every path ahead has been cut off...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're not seeing anything at the moment... Rover, be careful. Something bigger might be waiting for us ahead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Creating a Tacet Discord of this level... But it won't stop us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As expected, the enemies are increasingly strong as we approach the statue.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Have you been injured, Rover, Yangyang?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm okay, but Rover, {Male=he;Female=she}...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Give me your hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Knew it. The battle has left you with a few scratches.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I still have some first-aid with me. Please use them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The upcoming battles will be even more dangerous. Should you get injured, you must let me know in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's keep moving.

Chapters.Title: Reach the highest place in the Hovering Ruins

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The road ahead is completely blocked off.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You choose where the Disruptor's last blast hits. Make it count, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May it cleave out a path for us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This amount of enemies... We cannot fire the Disruptor again...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yangyang, you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Threnodian is only going to summon more of them as we go. We need someone to keep them away and escort the others into the statue.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand you're planning to do it yourself, General, but I think I am better suited for this task.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We all want to beat the Threnodian once and for all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand you don't want to leave anyone behind. But we all know you and Rover have the best chance against that monster.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that our shared goal is within hand's reach, I... I do not want to let it slip away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Indeed, Yangyang. Turns out I was the one being indecisive.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, Rover...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've witnessed the faith and fortitude of so many on our way here. It’s time I fulfill their trust.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, please leave it to me. I'll have your back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, Rover...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please make the call.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will stand guard here. The Threnodian will not be able to draw more power from the monsters.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll leave the rest to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At the final confrontation, Yangyang stays behind to deal with the surrounding threats. You concentrate, sensing the Threnodian's location, then aim at the Crownless statue's chest and give the order to fire.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seems the culprit is hidden deep within this statue.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This will be our final battle with the Threnodian. Rover, are you ready?

Options.PlotLineKey: Ready to kick some Threnodian arse!
I'd be lying to say I'm not nervous.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's the spirit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed. We've come too far to turn back now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, so many have put their faith in us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Being nervous is not necessarily detrimental; sometimes it helps you focus. Take a deep breath, and then...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's bring an end to this war, once and for all.

Chapters.Title: Defeat the Monster in front of You

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's... another "moon"... What on earth is happening...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Crownless... The Threnodian has reconstructed its frequencies.

Dialogues.Speaker: Crownless
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: FIGHT… ABSORB… EVOLVE…

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's been immobilized. Time to strike!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those frequencies we just crashed... The "moon" is drawing them in?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That "moon" has cannibalized the Crownless's remaining frequencies to created another monster.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember... I saw it during the Battle Beneath the Crescent...
DON'T YOU DARE... COME CLOSE...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the swordsmanship we teach our new recruits... How dare you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Watch out for its ranged attacks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, have you noticed?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It avoids attacking the "moon" behind. That "moon" must be the core of our enemy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This thing is weakening. I'll shield you from its attacks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, find a chance to strike its core!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Copied my weapon already, huh?

Chapters.Title: Defeat the Monster in front of You

Dialogues.Speaker: Dreamless: Blade of Extinction
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: MOTHER... NEEDS WEAPONS...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dreamless: Blade of Extinction
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: MORE WEAPONS... STRONGER... WEAPONS...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dreamless: Blade of Extinction
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: RETURN... THE WEAPONS... TO MOTHER...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dreamless: Blade of Extinction
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: YOU... MUST PAY...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Careful!

Chapters.Title: Defeat the Monster in front of You

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the conceptualization of war... Somehow it opted to flee, instead of fighting us properly.
Zzz... zzz...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, is that...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place is collapsing soon... Let's get out of here first.
